english.segment1: Rockin' around the Christmas tree. At the Christmas party hop. Mistletoe hung where you can see. Everybody tries to stop
english.segment2: Rockin' around the Christmas tree. Let the Christmas spirit ring. Later we'll have some pumpkin pie. And we'll do some caroling
english.segment3: You will get a sentimental feelin' when you hear. Voices singing let's be jolly. Deck the halls with boughs of holly
english.segment4: Rockin' around the Christmas tree. Have a happy holiday. Everyone's dancing merrily. In the new old fashioned way
english.segment5: You will get a sentimental feelin' when you hear. Voices singing let's be jolly. Deck the halls with boughs of holly
english.segment6: Rockin' around the Christmas tree. Have a happy holiday. Everyone's dancing merrily. In the new old fashioned way
english.segment7: Jingle bell, jingle bell, jingle bell rock. Jingle bells swing and jingle bells ring. Snowin' and blowin' up bushels of fun. That's the jingle bell rock rock rock
english.segment8: Jingle bell, jingle bell, jingle bell rock. Jingle bells chime in jingle bell time. Dancin' and prancin' in Jingle Bell Square. In the frosty air
english.segment9: What a bright time, it's the right time. To rock the night away. Jingle bell time is a swell time. To go gliding in a one-horse sleigh
english.segment10: Giddy-up jingle horse, pick up your feet. Jingle around the clock. Mix and mingle in the jingle bell rate. That's the jingle bell rock
english.segment11: What a bright time, it's the right time. To rock the night away. Jingle bell time is a swell time. To go gliding in a one-horse sleigh
english.segment12: Jingle bell, jingle bell, jingle bell rock. Jingle bells swing and jingle bells ring. Snowin' and blowin' up bushels of fun. That's the jingle bell rock
english.segment13: Mix and mingle in the jingle bell rate. That's the jingle bell. That's the jingle bell. That's the jingle bell rock.
